channel.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
channel.description:
So a new game called [url='https://prospektgame.com/']Prospekt[/url] has been released on [url='https://store.steampowered.com/app/399120/']Steam[/url].
it is made by one guy, called Richard Seabrook.
In short: The entire game is a sequel to the Half Life: Opposing Force game. You play as Adrian Shepherd, an US Marine that has been teleported to the Half Life 2 time and space to help out Gordon Freeman in the Nova Prospekt Combine prison.
I am definitely interested in it, and i am gonna try it out.
What do you guys think?

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
RedEye:

First game I ever refunded, it was that bad.

I didn’t know there is an option to refund. Well lucky me I read the opinions first.
Well too bad, the idea was promising.

Read full topic

Johnwalter:

So guys, i know i started this thread about the game/mod, and i still haven’t tried it.

After i heard about the negative flops, i didn’t think it would be that great to play.
Do you guys think it’s worth trying?

Don’t bother with it.

item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Crypt:

I don’t know how much experience he has, but he needs much more practice before trying to make it his day job. God, I can’t believe he supposedly quit his job and worked on this full-time for 2 years and it’s so unpolished.

He must’ve been very sure that it will be a success, but IIRC he hasn’t worked on any mods until now, there was just no way he could pull this off, not from the first attempt, or at least without any public beta and improve it based on player feedback.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: FRAG
item.description:
Plus in OpFor, you the player, knew that you were playing the role of Shephard, prospekt really could’ve been any person in the entire universe helping Gordon, there was not enough foundation in the provided story to cement Shepherd into the timeline.

And totally agreed with crypt on the mapping side, I was cringing so much at a lot of the decisions made in the design, it consisted of a few areas that had been polished to look pretty in screenshots and trailer while other areas were just crap, like seriously just useless areas that had no time or effort put into why this space existed.

The guy maybe asking for feedback on steam now but it’s a little late, he should’ve been doing this during development from a closed group, there are teams of people out there that do this for Source mods which would’ve greatly helped him, hell I bet if he asked any decent modder for a bit of feedback he would’ve got it.

I would love to turn my hobby into a job I really would, but I have been working for years to establish what I do while working a day job, I just can’t understand how 2 years of full time work resulted in this.

I hate bashing another developer, it’s not something I enjoy doing but this is a effectively a product that people paid for (yes refunds yada yada yada) a higher level should’ve been aimed for but this wasn’t the case, this looks like stuff I see on /r/hammer when a newish mapper is asking for feedback and advice.

Anyway, apologies, rants over, let’s see what he does next and if he can actually salvage what could’ve been.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
True enough. I’d been hearing so much news about this thing, even before it got onto Steam Greenlight, I was really expecting something amazing.
But as for the environments, my guess is that it’s supposed to be like Opposing Force, in that Shepard is unknowingly assisting Gordon throughout the game. so the same environments makes sense. But OF also had a ton of unique environments.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I disagree, from what I’ve seen, he technically knows how to operate Hammer, but has no idea what constitutes a decent map or gameplay. I bet many beginner mappers come up with a better Nova Prospekt in a week or two. I won’t dock him points for Xen being an eyesore (even though I should) because that sort of thing I can see being difficult to do decently, but HL2 is over a decade old, mimicking it’s done-to-death environments (the worst ones, no less) in a sub-par way isn’t the best way to go about creating good maps.

I don’t know how much experience he has, but he needs much more practice before trying to make it his day job. God, I can’t believe he supposedly quit his job and worked on this full-time for 2 years and it’s so unpolished.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
From what I’ve seen, I can say this much:
This guy seems to be a good map maker, but has no skill in making custom models or textures.
That dilemma is exactly why I don’t release maps. It’s not easy to create something original, and high quality, with limited resources.

Read full topic

item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Nova_Terra
item.description:
FRAG:

Yeah it really isn’t catching me as something to buy and play, I’ve got a backlog of mods I’d rather download and playthrough.

Thing is, was there a free version of this beforehand? Because if there was there would’ve been feedback to improve it, this appears to be more of a first release to players of any kind, doesn’t even seem play tested.

Thats’it , the main problem of this mod is that we did not have any kind of free version or trial version to test it,so he got 0 feedback from us about level desigh and gameplay.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
I never expected the game to be great either. All the trailer showed were a couple of reskins and new particle effects, way to few to raise up any kind of hype.

May be his dream and so on, and I respect that, but, it didn’t live up to the expectations. The game is a disappointment.

Crypt:

Many people have poured years into a hobby. “I spent time on it” isn’t a valid excuse to be exempt from criticism. I worked on HC for 3 years, that doesn’t mean it’s worth someone’s money.

“Charity.” My charity funds go to Kiva, not a guy who wants to make sub-par mods so he doesn’t have to work (and that is in his own given reason). I’d be singing a different tune if his product was quality to some degree, but he’s not presenting anything that makes me even want to play his work, let alone fund his future work.

And this. I personally agree with his opinion.

I don’t want to be mean, but these are just the facts.

Read full topic
item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.source: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: KevinJRattman
item.description:
Xen was a big disappointment. You know something’s wrong when it looks uglier than games made 18 years ago. Jeez, I could make something better than this (in black mesa)[/size]!

There. Made it in about 3 hours, It’s not perfect, never intended to be, but the point is source engine is capable of doing better than… this (disclaimer: i did not take ‘this’ pic, was taken from google). And even if it wasn’t for godrays, it still would look better. And it makes a smile on my face.

Read full topic

item.title: Prospekt - new Half Life 2 based game
item.dc:creator: CrowbarXL
item.description:
Crypt:

HL2 mod that looks about the same as your average HL2 mod a decade ago, priced at HL2’s level.
I think I’ll pass. Perhaps later on if the reviews are overwhelmingly positive I’ll give it a second look, but as it stands it seems I’ve already played plenty of its type. Looking at it I seriously doubt this mod will offer anything unique or interesting that deviates from your run of the mill HL2-based mod.

My exact thoughts, unfortunately.

Read full topic
